author: JENNIFER PELTZ and COLLEEN LONG
title: US deaths top 1,000 as $2.2 trillion in virus aid approved
description: U.S. deaths from the coronavirus pandemic have topped 1,000, in another grim milestone for a global outbreak that is taking lives and wreaking havoc on economies and established routines of ordinary life
content:
NEW YORK -- 
U.S. deaths from the coronavirus pandemic have topped 1,000, in another grim milestone for a global outbreak that is taking lives and wreaking havoc on economies and established routines of ordinary life.
